commit message: Fix readme on how to obtain bitcoinj for building
Rebase Base43 implementation on current bitcoinj Base58
Fix exception when updating disclaimer fragment at wrong times
Play fancy sound effect on receiving broadcast confirmations when sending coins, replacing the former sound effect
Accept bluetooth transactions in a service
Fix crash when exchange rate is invalid
Re-re-introduce workaround for 'IllegalStateException: Can not perform this action after onSaveInstanceState'
